bibl.title: Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday.

bibl.seg: Maria Kaczmarek, Human Remains from Marina el-Alamein.
Henryk Meyza & Iwona Zych (edd.), Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 233-257, 3 tabl., 7 figg. n./bl. et coul.

1. Introduction. - 2. Methodology: conceptual framework, skeletal inventory and scoring procedures. - 3. Palaeodemography: demotic structure of the population, mortality pattern. - 4.
